headline.main: Donald Trump, North Korea, South Sudan: Your Monday Briefing

lead_paragraph: U.S.-backed Syrian fighters on Monday cut the main road between the northern Syrian city of Raqqa, which is controlled by the Islamic State group, and the eastern city of Deir el-Zour, which is partially held by IS, as they press into the extremists' territory in Syria.
